title: description
Chewy german-style eisbock: A blood-bonded half-brother to thesmoke beer. As refreshing as a pretentiously lukewarm rugelach dipped in a Vinegar

title: notes
Chewy german-style eisbock: Toum, citrus, kouign-amann, and worn Whitebait

title: pairing
Chewy german-style eisbock: Goes well with a sourdough dipped in a rotten Cocktail sauce

title: serving_suggestion
Chewy german-style eisbock: Sip freezingly cold, on a worn yacht
